ygData.subject: Re: Unfair?
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually I stumbled across this the other day... out of necessity... In BlackBorrow, you will find a large islet platform on the water... It is a great place
ygData.messageBody:
Actually I stumbled across this the other day... out of necessity...
In BlackBorrow, you will find a large islet platform on the water...
It is a great place to call in kills from being that you can see a long way
and there are bridges that connect to the isle so you have a long view of
incoming Gnolls... well you also get trained there lots... so when it gets
too hot take a leap of faith into the drink and gate... you should have
plenty of time as the Gnolls don't want to join you.

Rutree II
Wizard of the 8th Circle



----- Original Message -----
From: Mata <mata_eq@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 11:57 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Unfair?


> From: "Mata" <mata_eq@...>
>
> JUMP OFF INTO THE WATER and CAST GATE FROM THE WATER!
> :-)
> worked for me...
